summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Specifies how the decoded video stream is interlaced. This enumeration is used with the AVDecVideoInputScanType property.

member.name: eAVDecVideoInputScanType.eAVDecVideoInputScan_Interlaced_UpperFieldFirst
member.summary: Decoded frames are interlaced, with the upper field appearing first.

member.name: eAVDecVideoInputScanType.eAVDecVideoInputScan_Interlaced_LowerFieldFirst
member.summary: Decoded frames are interlaced, with the lower field appearing first.
